maxSubUsecases.title: Maxsubusecases
maxSubUsecases.description: Maximum number of sub-usecases declaration required.

minSubUsecases.title: Minsubusecases
minSubUsecases.description: Minimum number of sub-usecases declaration required.

mnoMetadata.title: Mnometadata
mnoMetadata.description: Map of usecase metadata for each MNO. Key is the network ID of the MNO (e.g. 10017), Value is the mno metadata for the usecase.
